name: Sorrel Beverage
recipeIngredient: Honey, sugar or turbinado sugar to taste (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Pour boiling water into a large container to which has been added the sorrel, citrus peels, cinnamon, cloves and ginger. Allow to steep for 24 hours. Strain. Discard the solids. Sweeten to taste. Add the rice grains (for slight fermentation). Let stand another 24 hours. Strain out the rice grains. Refrigerate. Serve cold.
